title: Zelestra inks pact to supply 450 MW solar power to NTPC
description: Zelestra, a Spanish renewable energy company, has entered into a 25-year agreement to supply electricity from its 450 MW solar plant in Rajasthan to NTPC. The solar project is projected to produce 801 GWh annually, with a notable reduction in CO2 emissions over its lifespan. This supports Zelestra's expansion plans in India.
